name: CollapsiblePanel
description: The CollapsiblePanel component displays summary information and upon selecting the panel, it expands to display the full expansion panel.

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the title of the panel.

properties.name: activeTitle
properties.label: Active Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the title on opened the panel.

eventHandlers.name: onOpen
eventHandlers.label: On Open Panel Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user opens the panel section.

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: On Close Panel Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: Triggered when the user closes the panel section.
